import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; function ParkingDetails() { const { id } = useParams(); const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState(''); const [startTime, setStartTime] = useState(''); const [duration, setDuration] = useState(1); // Mock parking spot data const parkingSpot = { id: id, name: "Central Plaza Parking", address: "123 Main St, Downtown", rating: 4.5, totalReviews: 128, price: "5.00", available: 15, images: [ "https://example.com/parking1.jpg", "https://example.com/parking2.jpg" ], features: [ "24/7 Access", "Security Cameras", "Covered Parking", "EV Charging" ], reviews: [ { user: "John D.", rating: 5, comment: "Great location, easy to find and park.", date: "2024-02-20" }, { user: "Sarah M.", rating: 4, comment: "Clean and secure parking spot.", date: "2024-02-18" } ] }; const handleBooking = () => { // Handle booking logic console.log('Booking:', { selectedDate, startTime, duration }); }; return (

{parkingSpot.name}

★ {parkingSpot.rating} ({parkingSpot.totalReviews} reviews)

{parkingSpot.address}

{parkingSpot.images.map((image, index) => (
Parking Image {index + 1}
))}

Book Your Spot

setSelectedDate(e.target.value)} className="input-field" />
setStartTime(e.target.value)} className="input-field" />
Rate ${parkingSpot.price}/hr
Duration {duration} hours
Total ${(parseFloat(parkingSpot.price) * duration).toFixed(2)}

Features

{parkingSpot.features.map((feature, index) => (
✓ {feature}
))}

Reviews

{parkingSpot.reviews.map((review, index) => (
{review.user} ★ {review.rating}

{review.comment}

{review.date}
))}
); } export default ParkingDetails;
